definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Fiesco, set free, encounters Paolo on his way to execution.
sentences.chinese: 菲耶斯科获释，并在与被押赴刑场的保罗在路上相遇。

sentences.english: Next day when I go to the execution ground, mother hopes you will not watery.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，当我去刑场，妈妈希望你不会流泪。

sentences.english: On the execution ground, gowardesh chip finally won the vitality for the treasure.
sentences.chinese: 刑场上，狗娃以宝藏为筹码终于获得了生机。

sentences.english: Haikou Intermediate People's Court sentenced the end, Dong Lin was escorted to an execution ground.
sentences.chinese: 海口中院公判会结束后，董林被押赴刑场执行死刑。

sentences.english: Chinese execution ground you stand on the first few rows?
sentences.chinese: 中国人，刑场上你站在第几排？

sentences.english: A death sentence may be executed on the execution ground or in a designated place of custody.
sentences.chinese: 死刑可以在刑场或者指定的羁押场所内执行。

sentences.english: Very soon, he was brought to the execution ground and shot.
sentences.chinese: 很快的，他就被带上刑场枪毙。

sentences.english: Wang Erni and all students to the execution ground.
sentences.chinese: 王二妮和所有学员都到了刑场。

definition: to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
to parade (a prisoner) through the streets
to send under escort/to transport a detainee
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
